1
For IR Scope:
+1050 -550 +1050 -500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -2550 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -550 +1050 -2550 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1050 -550 +1050 -2550 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1050 -2550 +1050 -2550 +1050 -2500 +1050 -550 +1050 -550 +1050 -500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -2550 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1050 -2550 +1050 -2550 +1050 -2500 +1050 -550 +1050 -2550 +1050 -2500 +1100 -500 +1100 -450 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -2550 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -2550 +1050 -2500 +1050 -550 +1050 -2550 +1050 -2500 +1050 -550 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -550 +1050 -550 +1100 -500 +1050 -2500 +1100 -500 +1050 -550 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1050 -550 +1050 -2550 +1050 -550 +1050 -550 +1050 -550 +1000 -550 +1050 -2550 +1050 -2550 +1000
For Arduino sketch:
unsigned int raw[162] = {1050,550,1050,500,1100,2500,1100,2500,1050,500,1100,500,1100,2500,1050,2550,1050,500,1100,500,1100,2500,1050,550,1050,2550,1050,500,1100,500,1050,550,1050,2550,1050,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1050,2550,1050,2550,1050,2500,1050,550,1050,550,1050,500,1100,2500,1050,2550,1050,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1050,2550,1050,2550,1050,2500,1050,550,1050,2550,1050,2500,1100,500,1100,450,1100,2500,1100,2500,1100,2500,1050,500,1100,2500,1050,2550,1050,500,1100,500,1100,2500,1050,2550,1050,2500,1050,550,1050,2550,1050,2500,1050,550,1050,500,1100,500,1100,2500,1050,550,1050,550,1100,500,1050,2500,1100,500,1050,550,1100,500,1100,500,1050,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1050,550,1050,2550,1050,550,1050,550,1050,550,1000,550,1050,2550,1050,2550,1000,};
irsend.sendRaw(raw,162,38);

2
For IR Scope:
+1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2450 +1150 -2500 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -2500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -450 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -2500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -450 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2500 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -450 +1150 -2450 +1100 -2500 +1100 -500 +1100 -450 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -2500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -2500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -450 +1150 -2450 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -550 +1050 -550 +1050 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -450 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2450 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -500 +1100 -2500 +1100 -2450 +1100
For Arduino sketch:
unsigned int raw[162] = {1100,500,1100,500,1100,2450,1150,2500,1050,500,1100,500,1100,2450,1100,2500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,2450,1100,500,1100,2500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,450,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,2500,1050,2500,1100,2500,1100,450,1100,500,1100,500,1100,2500,1100,2500,1050,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,2450,1100,2500,1100,2500,1100,450,1150,2450,1100,2500,1100,500,1100,450,1100,2500,1100,2500,1100,2450,1100,500,1100,2500,1100,2450,1100,500,1100,500,1100,2500,1100,2450,1100,2500,1100,500,1100,2450,1100,2500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,450,1150,2450,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,2450,1100,550,1050,550,1050,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,450,1100,500,1100,2500,1100,2450,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,500,1100,2500,1100,2450,1100,};
